name: Preservation Master
description: Best quality representation of the Object appropriate for long-term preservation

name: Service File
description: A medium quality representation of the Object appropriate for serving to users

name: Thumbnail
description: A low resolution image representation of the Object appropriate for using as an icon

name: Audio
description: A resource primarily intended to be heard. Examples include a music playback file format, an audio compact disc, and recorded speech or sounds

name: Binary
description: A generic binary file for repository items that don't fall into any other category or cannot be shown in a browser

name: Collection
description: A collection is an aggregation of items

name: Image
description: A visual representation other than text, including all types of moving image and still image

name: Video
description: A recording of visual images, usually in motion and with sound accompaniment
